page.name: Shining Helm of Destiny
page.description: Once belonging to a famous paladin, it is said that a single gaze from this helm will obliterate shadow itself; no darkness is safe from its vigilance! This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

properties.name: Shining Helm of Destiny
properties.description: Once belonging to a famous paladin, it is said that a single gaze from this helm will obliterate shadow itself; no darkness is safe from its vigilance! This item requires a Dragon Amulet.

page.name: The Growing Darkness
page.description: The Mysterious Stranger's Super Ultra Mega Darkness Dracolich is growing... gathering all the spirits of darkness from the shadows in the world to block out the light!
